
CKEditor DeepaMehta Customization
=================================

This is a custom build of CKEditor 4.3.1 as configured via http://ckeditor.com/builder

    - Preset: Standard
    - Remove plugins:
        - About CKEditor (about)
        - Accessibility Help (a11yhelp)
        - Editor Resize
        - Elements Path
        - IFrame Editing Area
        - Maximize
        - Source Editing Area
        - Special Characters (specialchar)
        - SpellCheckAsYouType (scayt)
        - Styles Combo
        - WebSpellChecker (wsc)
    - Skin: "Moono"
    - Languages: English
    - Source: optimized


CKEditor Configuration
----------------------

No DeepaMehta specific configurations so far.
